alert.note: Alert for Manua (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Statement issued January 31 at 3:45PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM SST FOR MANUA ... Satellite data indicates heavy showers and thunderstorms continuing to move over the Manu`a Islands. Expect flash flooding conditions to continue into the early evening hours. O LOO FAAAUAU PEA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 345 AOAULI ASO GAFUA IANUARI 31 2022 ...O LOO FAAAUAU PEA le LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA e oo i le 7 i le afiafi nei mo Manu`a... O loo fa`ailoa mai pea i luga o ata satelite timuga mamafa ma faititili o lo`o gasolo i luga o Manu`a. O le a mafai on fa`atupula`ia ai lologa ma tafega mo nai isi itula e oo i le afiafi nei. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O LE UIGA O LE LAPATAIGA MO LOLOGA MA TAFEGA UA IAI NEI LOLOGA PO O TAFEGA I LE ATUNUU I NOFOAGA MAUALALO FAAPEA AUALA-TELE. AFAI O LOU MAOTA E LATA I ALA-VAI PE O LOO I NOFOAGA MAUALALO...IA TULA`I ESE MA AGA`I ATU LOA I NOFOAGA MAPU`EPU`E. AUA NE`I SAVALIA PE UIA AUALA UA IAI TAFEGA PO O LOLOGA. IA RIPOTIA TULAGA LOULOUA O LE TAU MA NISI FAALETONU I LE OFISA O LEOLEO PO O LE EOC...E LATOU TE FAAILOA MAI LAU RIPORT I LE OFISA O LE TAU.
info.instruction: A Flash Flood Warning means flash flooding is imminent or occurring in streams, roads and low lying areas. Move to higher ground immediately if your home is in a flood prone area. Do not cross fast flowing or rising waters in your vehicle or on foot. Report severe weather to the local police officials or the emergency operations center (EOC). They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Office.
